dimensions: Warp x Weft: 274 x 81 cm (8 ft. 11 7/8 in. x 31 7/8 in.)
title: Rebozo
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: warp resist dyed before weaving (jaspe); warp-faced plain weave; warp fringe with knotting
description: Indigo-dyed in small spots of white and light blue set between thin stripes of navy blue. Dark blue warp fringe 16.5 inches deep with elaborate knotting in rosette, band, and zigzag pattern.
name: Rebozo
